long_description: The 16GB Sony Class 10 microSDHC card offers digital storage in a tiny format and is ideal for loading up on music, photos, video and games on your mobile devices. Memory card offers reliable storage for media-rich applications, including high-definition photos, MP3s and even full 1080p videos. Rugged, waterproof design performs in temperatures ranging from -13deg to 185degF (25deg - 85degC). Included SD adapter lets you swap the microSDHC card from a mobile phone to a camera or to any other SD compatible host for easy file sharing and transfer. Class 10 Micro SDHC.
short_description: The 16GB Sony Class 10 microSDHC card offers digital storage in a tiny format and is ideal for loading up on music, photos, video and games on your mobile devices.
